word:
I have had to deal with fanaticism of every grade. From my first experience in the work I have had to combat fanaticism on the right hand and on the left. God forbid that the closing years of my life should be made sad through having to deal with this evil.--Ms 70, 1901. 







Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
March 8, 1990. Entire Ms.
